name: Fortress Goon

auras.raw_description:
(Unlocks at Ascension Level 3)
Increases Ally DEF in Dungeons for 23%

skills.name: Cruel Trap
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on [DEF][ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Devastating Wounds
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on [DEF][ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Mobile Fort
skills.raw_description:
Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP. Places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
